quote: The artist is a receptacle for emotions that come from all over the place: from the sky, from the earth, from a scrap of paper, from a passing shape, from a spider's web.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.
author: Willem de Kooning

quote: The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: No better way is there to learn to love Nature than to understand Art. It dignifies every flower of the field. And, the boy who sees the thing of beauty which a bird on the wing becomes when transferred to wood or canvas will probably not throw the customary stone.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not coming, but on our own readiness to receive him; not on the chance of his not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Summer is a great time to visit art museums, which offer the refreshing rinse of swimming pools - only instead of cool water, you immerse yourself in art.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
author: Henri Poincare

quote: Technology is a compulsive and addictive way to live. Verbal communication cannot be lost because of a lack of skill. The ability to listen and learn is key to mastering the art of communication. If you don't use your verbal skills and networking, it will disappear rapidly. Use technology wisely.
author: Rick Pitino

quote: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece. Help others. Drink deeply from good books. Make friendship a fine art. Build a shelter against a rainy day.
author: John Wooden

quote: The art of art, the glory of expression and the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Once an object has been incorporated in a picture it accepts a new destiny.
author: Georges Braque

quote: Art is like a border of flowers along the course of civilization.
author: Lincoln Steffens

quote: To me, photography is an art of observation. It's about finding something interesting in an ordinary place... I've found it has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.
author: Elliott Erwitt

quote: If a work of art is rich and vital and complete, those who have artistic instincts will see its beauty, and those to whom ethics appeal more strongly than aesthetics will see its moral lesson. It will fill the cowardly with terror, and the unclean will see in it their own shame.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Find a beautiful piece of art. If you fall in love with Van Gogh or Matisse or John Oliver Killens, or if you fall love with the music of Coltrane, the music of Aretha Franklin, or the music of Chopin - find some beautiful art and admire it, and realize that that was created by human beings just like you, no more human, no less.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The art of effective listening is essential to clear communication, and clear communication is necessary to management success.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
author: Julia Child

quote: There will be very few occasions when you are absolutely certain about anything. You will consistently be called upon to make decisions with limited information. That being the case, your goal should not be to eliminate uncertainty. Instead, you must develop the art of being clear in the face of uncertainty.
author: Andy Stanley

quote: Sometimes, being different feels a lot like being alone. But with that being said, being true to that and being true to my standards and my way of doing things in my art and my music, everything that has made me feel very different... in the end, it has made me the happiest.
author: Lindsey Stirling

quote: Some painters transform the sun into a yellow spot, others transform a yellow spot into the sun.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.

quote: A fool's brain digests philosophy into folly, science into superstition, and art into pedantry. Hence University education.

quote: Life doesn't imitate art, it imitates bad television.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Art is what you can get away with.

author: CeeLo Green

quote: The modern work of art, as I have said, is a symbol.
author: Herbert Read

quote: London, thou art the flower of cities all!
author: William Dunbar

quote: Our best teachers do more than impart facts and figures - they inspire and encourage students and instill a true desire to learn. That's a fine art in itself.
author: Sonny Perdue

quote: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: Life is a lot more interesting if you are interested in the people and the places around you. So, illuminate your little patch of ground, the people that you know, the things that you want to commemorate. Light them up with your art, with your music, with your writing, with whatever it is that you do.
author: Alan Moore

quote: The art of healing comes from nature, not from the physician. Therefore the physician must start from nature, with an open mind.
author: Paracelsus

quote: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy.
author: Will Durant

quote: A work of art is above all an adventure of the mind.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: I have no fear of making changes, destroying the image, etc., because the painting has a life of its own.
author: Jackson Pollock

quote: You can't do sketches enough. Sketch everything and keep your curiosity fresh.
author: John Singer Sargent

quote: Rationalism is the enemy of art, though necessary as a basis for architecture.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: All architecture is great architecture after sunset; perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Memory is a great artist. For every man and for every woman it makes the recollection of his or her life a work of art and an unfaithful record.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: All equestrians, if they last long enough, learn that riding in whatever form is a lifelong sport and art, an endeavor that is both familiar and new every time you take the horse out of his stall or pasture.
author: Jane Smiley

quote: Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Without innovation, it is a corpse.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Art consists of reshaping life, but it does not create life nor cause life.
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Art is, for me, the process of trying to wake up the soul. Because we live in an industrialized, fast-paced world that prefers that the soul remain asleep.
author: Bill Viola

quote: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: All great art is born of the metropolis.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: I'm for mechanical art. When I took up silk screening, it was to more fully exploit the preconceived image through the commercial techniques of multiple reproduction.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Art is always and everywhere the secret confession, and at the same time the immortal movement of its time.
author: Karl Marx

quote: I've always wanted to be an animator. That's an ultimate art form, right there.
author: Jason Marsden

quote: Art is basically made by dissatisfied people who are willing to find some means to relieve the dissatisfaction.
author: John Chamberlain

quote: Love-making is an art which must be studied.

quote: A man paints with his brains and not with his hands.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Art has to move you and design does not, unless it's a good design for a bus.
author: David Hockney

quote: The artist who aims at perfection in everything achieves it in nothing.
author: Eugene Delacroix

quote: Art is the daughter of freedom.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Paint the essential character of things.
author: Camille Pissarro

quote: Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Sleeping is no mean art: for its sake one must stay awake all day.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Balance is key. Balance is a virtue. Balance is next to godliness, maybe. We should all aspire to better balance. Too much of what is said in this world is one-sided, and we need more balance - in our speech, in our music, in our art, in everything.
author: CeeLo Green

quote: The modern work of art, as I have said, is a symbol.
author: Herbert Read

quote: London, thou art the flower of cities all!
author: William Dunbar

quote: Our best teachers do more than impart facts and figures - they inspire and encourage students and instill a true desire to learn. That's a fine art in itself.
author: Sonny Perdue

quote: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: Life is a lot more interesting if you are interested in the people and the places around you. So, illuminate your little patch of ground, the people that you know, the things that you want to commemorate. Light them up with your art, with your music, with your writing, with whatever it is that you do.
author: Alan Moore

quote: The art of healing comes from nature, not from the physician. Therefore the physician must start from nature, with an open mind.
author: Paracelsus

quote: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy.
author: Will Durant

quote: A work of art is above all an adventure of the mind.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: I have no fear of making changes, destroying the image, etc., because the painting has a life of its own.
author: Jackson Pollock

quote: You can't do sketches enough. Sketch everything and keep your curiosity fresh.
author: John Singer Sargent

quote: Rationalism is the enemy of art, though necessary as a basis for architecture.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: All architecture is great architecture after sunset; perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Memory is a great artist. For every man and for every woman it makes the recollection of his or her life a work of art and an unfaithful record.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: All equestrians, if they last long enough, learn that riding in whatever form is a lifelong sport and art, an endeavor that is both familiar and new every time you take the horse out of his stall or pasture.
author: Jane Smiley

quote: Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Without innovation, it is a corpse.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Art consists of reshaping life, but it does not create life nor cause life.
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Art is, for me, the process of trying to wake up the soul. Because we live in an industrialized, fast-paced world that prefers that the soul remain asleep.
author: Bill Viola

quote: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: All great art is born of the metropolis.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: I'm for mechanical art. When I took up silk screening, it was to more fully exploit the preconceived image through the commercial techniques of multiple reproduction.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Art is always and everywhere the secret confession, and at the same time the immortal movement of its time.
author: Karl Marx

quote: I've always wanted to be an animator. That's an ultimate art form, right there.
author: Jason Marsden

quote: Art is basically made by dissatisfied people who are willing to find some means to relieve the dissatisfaction.
author: John Chamberlain

quote: Love-making is an art which must be studied.
author: Ivor Novello

quote: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
author: James Humes

quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
author: Victor Pinchuk

quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.
author: John Wooden

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
author: Bernie Siegel

quote: My trade and art is to live.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: This world is but a canvas to our imagination.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If we could but paint with the hand what we see with the eye.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The more horrifying this world becomes, the more art becomes abstract.
author: Ellen Key

quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Excellence is an art won by training and habituation. We do not act rightly because we have virtue or excellence, but we rather have those because we have acted rightly. We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Riding a race bike is an art - a thing that you do because you feel something inside.
author: Valentino Rossi

quote: Great art is an instant arrested in eternity.
author: James Huneker

quote: Art is either plagiarism or revolution.
author: Paul Gauguin

quote: I like to pretend that my art has nothing to do with me.
author: Roy Lichtenstein

quote: Next to the Word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating. It is either good or bad.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The art of war is simple enough. Find out where your enemy is. Get at him as soon as you can. Strike him as hard as you can, and keep moving on.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
author: Don Marquis

quote: The art and science of asking questions is the source of all knowledge.
author: Thomas Berger

quote: All art is but imitation of nature.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly and applying the wrong remedies.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
author: Julia Morgan

quote: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Every production of an artist should be the expression of an adventure of his soul.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: No great artist ever sees things as they really are. If he did, he would cease to be an artist.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The history of art is the history of revivals.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
author: Aristotle

quote: The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
author: Paul Hawken

quote: Life is like art. You have to work hard to keep it simple and still have meaning.
author: Charles de Lint

quote: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over.
author: Octavia Butler

quote: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
author: Voltaire

quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
author: Dorothea Lange

quote: I enjoy art, architecture, museums, churches and temples; anything that gives me insight into the history and soul of the place I'm in. I can also be a beach bum - I like to laze in the shade of a palm tree with a good book or float in a warm sea at sundown.
author: Cherie Lunghi

quote: Great art is never produced for its own sake. It is too difficult to be worth the effort.
author: Robert Quillen

quote: It is not up to me whether I win or lose. Ultimately, this might not be my day. And it is that philosophy towards sports, something that I really truly live by. I am emotional. I want to win. I am hungry. I am a competitor. I have that fire. But deep down, I truly enjoy the art of competing so much more than the result.
author: Apolo Ohno

quote: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.
author: Michelangelo

quote: There's nothing more superficial to do than to paint a beautiful woman. The most beautiful portraits in art were of ugly women. If you paint Brigitte Bardot, it's a disaster. Sunsets, you have to stay away from sunsets. You paint a sunset, you are in great danger.
author: Fernando Botero

quote: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death.
author: William Blake

quote: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Art is difficult.
author: Scott Thompson

quote: But I've always tried to make the best of fear, then, because without fears there's no art.
author: Tracie Bennett

quote: I love that works of art are printed so that anyone can buy them. The variety of what they put on little postcards astounds me.
author: Leonard Lauder

quote: Art is the elimination of the unnecessary.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: If a man devotes himself to art, much evil is avoided that happens otherwise if one is idle.
author: Albrecht Durer

quote: Art is individualism, and individualism is a disturbing and disintegrating force.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: No great art has ever been made without the artist having known danger.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Every other artist begins with a blank canvas, a piece of paper the photographer begins with the finished product.
author: Edward Steichen

quote: I will never forget experiencing Venice for the first time. It feels like you are transported to another time - the art, music, food and pure romance in the air is like no other place.
author: Elizabeth Berkley

quote: Reason clears and plants the wilderness of the imagination to harvest the wheat of art.
author: Austin O'Malley

quote: When I go to an art gallery and stand in front of a painting, I don't want someone telling me what I should be seeing or thinking; I want to feel whatever I feel, see whatever I see, and figure out what I figure out.

quote: I got my first camera when I was 21 - my boyfriend gave it to me for my birthday - but at that point politics was my life, and I viewed the camera as a tool for expressing my political beliefs rather than as an art medium.
author: Carrie Mae Weems

quote: When you live under the power of terror and segregation, you can't ever start a work of art.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: The works must be conceived with fire in the soul but executed with clinical coolness.
author: Joan Miro

quote: Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: My attitude towards drawing is not necessarily about drawing. It's about making the best kind of image I can make, it's about talking as clearly as I can.
author: Jim Dine

quote: Nature is the art of God.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: History has remembered the kings and warriors, because they destroyed; art has remembered the people, because they created.
author: William Morris

quote: People discuss my art and pretend to understand as if it were necessary to understand, when it's simply necessary to love.
author: Claude Monet

quote: Animation is not the art of drawings that move but the art of movements that are drawn.
author: Norman McLaren

quote: Simplicity and repose are the qualities that measure the true value of any work of art.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: No art is less spontaneous than mine. What I do is the result of reflection and the study of the great masters.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Venice is the perfect place for a phase of art to die. No other city on earth embraces entropy quite like this magical floating mall.

quote: The work of art, just like any fragment of human life considered in its deepest meaning, seems to me devoid of value if it does not offer the hardness, the rigidity, the regularity, the luster on every interior and exterior facet, of the crystal.

quote: Anime is intended to have ambiguous features. That's part of the art form.
author: M. Night Shyamalan

quote: In the 'Garnethill' trilogy, people always forget that Maureen O'Donnell's dad was a journalist and she did art history at uni and her brother did law, but no-one ever thinks they're middle-class - they're just working class because they speak with accents.

quote: The artist is a receptacle for emotions that come from all over the place: from the sky, from the earth, from a scrap of paper, from a passing shape, from a spider's web.

quote: An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.

quote: The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: No better way is there to learn to love Nature than to understand Art. It dignifies every flower of the field. And, the boy who sees the thing of beauty which a bird on the wing becomes when transferred to wood or canvas will probably not throw the customary stone.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not coming, but on our own readiness to receive him; not on the chance of his not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Summer is a great time to visit art museums, which offer the refreshing rinse of swimming pools - only instead of cool water, you immerse yourself in art.

quote: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.

quote: Technology is a compulsive and addictive way to live. Verbal communication cannot be lost because of a lack of skill. The ability to listen and learn is key to mastering the art of communication. If you don't use your verbal skills and networking, it will disappear rapidly. Use technology wisely.
author: Rick Pitino

quote: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece. Help others. Drink deeply from good books. Make friendship a fine art. Build a shelter against a rainy day.
author: John Wooden

quote: The art of art, the glory of expression and the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Once an object has been incorporated in a picture it accepts a new destiny.

quote: Art is like a border of flowers along the course of civilization.

quote: To me, photography is an art of observation. It's about finding something interesting in an ordinary place... I've found it has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.

quote: If a work of art is rich and vital and complete, those who have artistic instincts will see its beauty, and those to whom ethics appeal more strongly than aesthetics will see its moral lesson. It will fill the cowardly with terror, and the unclean will see in it their own shame.

quote: Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Find a beautiful piece of art. If you fall in love with Van Gogh or Matisse or John Oliver Killens, or if you fall love with the music of Coltrane, the music of Aretha Franklin, or the music of Chopin - find some beautiful art and admire it, and realize that that was created by human beings just like you, no more human, no less.

quote: The art of effective listening is essential to clear communication, and clear communication is necessary to management success.

quote: A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not.

quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.

quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.

quote: There will be very few occasions when you are absolutely certain about anything. You will consistently be called upon to make decisions with limited information. quote: Some painters transform the sun into a yellow spot, others transform a yellow spot into the sun.

quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.

quote: Art is anything you can get away with.

quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.

quote: Music is the art of the prophets and the gift of God.

quote: Art in the classroom not only spurs creativity, it also inspires learning.

quote: A fool's brain digests philosophy into folly, science into superstition, and art into pedantry. Hence University education.

quote: If you're not trying to be real, you don't have to get it right. That's art.

quote: Art is what you can get away with.

quote: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
author: Voltaire

quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
author: Dorothea Lange

quote: I enjoy art, architecture, museums, churches and temples; anything that gives me insight into the history and soul of the place I'm in. I can also be a beach bum - I like to laze in the shade of a palm tree with a good book or float in a warm sea at sundown.
author: Cherie Lunghi

quote: Great art is never produced for its own sake. It is too difficult to be worth the effort.
author: Robert Quillen

quote: It is not up to me whether I win or lose. Ultimately, this might not be my day. And it is that philosophy towards sports, something that I really truly live by. I am emotional. I want to win. I am hungry. I am a competitor. I have that fire. But deep down, I truly enjoy the art of competing so much more than the result.
author: Apolo Ohno

quote: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.
author: Michelangelo

quote: There's nothing more superficial to do than to paint a beautiful woman. The most beautiful portraits in art were of ugly women. If you paint Brigitte Bardot, it's a disaster. Sunsets, you have to stay away from sunsets. You paint a sunset, you are in great danger.
author: Fernando Botero

quote: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death.
author: William Blake

quote: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Art is difficult.
author: Scott Thompson

quote: But I've always tried to make the best of fear, then, because without fears there's no art.
author: Tracie Bennett

quote: I love that works of art are printed so that anyone can buy them. The variety of what they put on little postcards astounds me.
author: Leonard Lauder

quote: Art is the elimination of the unnecessary.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: If a man devotes himself to art, much evil is avoided that happens otherwise if one is idle.
author: Albrecht Durer

quote: Art is individualism, and individualism is a disturbing and disintegrating force.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: No great art has ever been made without the artist having known danger.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Every other artist begins with a blank canvas, a piece of paper the photographer begins with the finished product.
author: Edward Steichen

quote: I will never forget experiencing Venice for the first time. It feels like you are transported to another time - the art, music, food and pure romance in the air is like no other place.
author: Elizabeth Berkley

quote: Reason clears and plants the wilderness of the imagination to harvest the wheat of art.
author: Austin O'Malley

quote: When I go to an art gallery and stand in front of a painting, I don't want someone telling me what I should be seeing or thinking; I want to feel whatever I feel, see whatever I see, and figure out what I figure out.
author: James Frey

quote: I got my first camera when I was 21 - my boyfriend gave it to me for my birthday - but at that point politics was my life, and I viewed the camera as a tool for expressing my political beliefs rather than as an art medium.
author: Carrie Mae Weems

quote: When you live under the power of terror and segregation, you can't ever start a work of art.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: The works must be conceived with fire in the soul but executed with clinical coolness.
author: Joan Miro

quote: Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: My attitude towards drawing is not necessarily about drawing. It's about making the best kind of image I can make, it's about talking as clearly as I can.
author: Jim Dine

quote: Nature is the art of God.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: History has remembered the kings and warriors, because they destroyed; art has remembered the people, because they created.
author: William Morris

quote: People discuss my art and pretend to understand as if it were necessary to understand, when it's simply necessary to love.
author: Claude Monet

quote: Animation is not the art of drawings that move but the art of movements that are drawn.
author: Norman McLaren

quote: Simplicity and repose are the qualities that measure the true value of any work of art.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: No art is less spontaneous than mine. What I do is the result of reflection and the study of the great masters.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Venice is the perfect place for a phase of art to die. No other city on earth embraces entropy quite like this magical floating mall.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: The work of art, just like any fragment of human life considered in its deepest meaning, seems to me devoid of value if it does not offer the hardness, the rigidity, the regularity, the luster on every interior and exterior facet, of the crystal.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: Anime is intended to have ambiguous features. That's part of the art form.
author: M. Night Shyamalan

quote: In the 'Garnethill' trilogy, people always forget that Maureen O'Donnell's dad was a journalist and she did art history at uni and her brother did law, but no-one ever thinks they're middle-class - they're just working class because they speak with accents.
author: Denise Mina

quote: The art of war is of vital importance to the state. It is a matter of life and death, a road either to safety or to ruin. Hence it is a subject of inquiry which can on no account be neglected.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: The wonders of the Grand Canyon cannot be adequately represented in symbols of speech, nor by speech itself. The resources of the graphic art are taxed beyond their powers in attempting to portray its features. Language and illustration combined must fail.
author: John Wesley Powell

quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Personality is everything in art and poetry.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: All art is at once surface and symbol. Those who go beneath the surface do so at their peril. Those who read the symbol do so at their peril. It is the spectator, and not life, that art really mirrors. Diversity of opinion about a work of art shows that the work is new, complex and vital.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: One eye sees, the other feels.
author: Paul Klee

quote: Only in art will the lion lie down with the lamb, and the rose grow without the thorn.
author: Martin Amis

quote: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Dance is the most fundamental of all art forms.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: When I think of art I think of beauty. Beauty is the mystery of life. It is not in the eye it is in the mind. In our minds there is awareness of perfection.
author: Agnes Martin

quote: Whenever we witness art in a building, we are aware of an energy contained by it.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: A beautiful lady is an accident of nature. A beautiful old lady is a work of art.
author: Louis Nizer

quote: A good mother remembers to serve fruit at breakfast, is always cheerful and never yells, manages not to project her own neuroses and inadequacies onto her children, is an active and beloved community volunteer. She remembers to make play dates, her children's clothes fit, she does art projects with them and enjoys all their games.
author: Ayelet Waldman

quote: The art of simplicity is a puzzle of complexity.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: Guided only by their feeling for symmetry, simplicity, and generality, and an indefinable sense of the fitness of things, creative mathematicians now, as in the past, are inspired by the art of mathematics rather than by any prospect of ultimate usefulness.
author: E. T. Bell

quote: It's not new that architecture can profoundly affect a place, sometimes transform it. Architecture and any art can transform a person, even save someone.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: My art is not limited to the songs I create but also to the reaction it creates. I like to sit back and look at the whole thing as if it's a tornado that I'm controlling. It's creating chaos. When you create chaos, ideas are turned upside down, and everybody looks at things in a different way.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: It is through art, and through art only, that we can realise our perfection.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The study of the art of motorcycle maintenance is really a miniature study of the art of rationality itself. Working on a motorcycle, working well, caring, is to become part of a process, to achieve an inner peace of mind. The motorcycle is primarily a mental phenomenon.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: I don't think there is too much art involved in what I do.
author: Giorgio Moroder

quote: I don't think art is propaganda; it should be something that liberates the soul, provokes the imagination and encourages people to go further. It celebrates humanity instead of manipulating it.
author: Keith Haring

quote: Errors are not in the art but in the artificers.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Art is the most intense mode of individualism that the world has known.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A picture is worth a thousand words.
author: Unknown

quote: It is the spectator, and not life, that art really mirrors.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: What the mass media offers is not popular art, but entertainment which is intended to be consumed like food, forgotten, and replaced by a new dish.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: The artist is a receptacle for emotions that come from all over the place: from the sky, from the earth, from a scrap of paper, from a passing shape, from a spider's web.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.
author: Willem de Kooning

quote: The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: No better way is there to learn to love Nature than to understand Art. It dignifies every flower of the field. And, the boy who sees the thing of beauty which a bird on the wing becomes when transferred to wood or canvas will probably not throw the customary stone.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not coming, but on our own readiness to receive him; not on the chance of his not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Summer is a great time to visit art museums, which offer the refreshing rinse of swimming pools - only instead of cool water, you immerse yourself in art.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
author: Henri Poincare

quote: Technology is a compulsive and addictive way to live. Verbal communication cannot be lost because of a lack of skill. The ability to listen and learn is key to mastering the art of communication. If you don't use your verbal skills and networking, it will disappear rapidly. Use technology wisely.
author: Rick Pitino

quote: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece. Help others. Drink deeply from good books. Make friendship a fine art. Build a shelter against a rainy day.
author: John Wooden

quote: The art of art, the glory of expression and the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Once an object has been incorporated in a picture it accepts a new destiny.
author: Georges Braque

quote: Art is like a border of flowers along the course of civilization.
author: Lincoln Steffens

quote: To me, photography is an art of observation. It's about finding something interesting in an ordinary place... I've found it has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.
author: Elliott Erwitt

quote: If a work of art is rich and vital and complete, those who have artistic instincts will see its beauty, and those to whom ethics appeal more strongly than aesthetics will see its moral lesson. It will fill the cowardly with terror, and the unclean will see in it their own shame.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Find a beautiful piece of art. If you fall in love with Van Gogh or Matisse or John Oliver Killens, or if you fall love with the music of Coltrane, the music of Aretha Franklin, or the music of Chopin - find some beautiful art and admire it, and realize that that was created by human beings just like you, no more human, no less.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The art of effective listening is essential to clear communication, and clear communication is necessary to management success.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
author: Julia Child

quote: There will be very few occasions when you are absolutely certain about anything. You will consistently be called upon to make decisions with limited information. That being the case, your goal should not be to eliminate uncertainty. Instead, you must develop the art of being clear in the face of uncertainty.
author: Andy Stanley

quote: Sometimes, being different feels a lot like being alone. But with that being said, being true to that and being true to my standards and my way of doing things in my art and my music, everything that has made me feel very different... in the end, it has made me the happiest.
author: Lindsey Stirling

quote: Some painters transform the sun into a yellow spot, others transform a yellow spot into the sun.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Art is anything you can get away with.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
author: Mark Van Doren

quote: The marble not yet carved can hold the form of every thought the greatest artist has.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Music is the art of the prophets and the gift of God.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I consider skateboarding an art form, a lifestyle and a sport. 'Action sport' would be the least offensive categorization.
author: Tony Hawk

quote: Art in the classroom not only spurs creativity, it also inspires learning.
author: Mickey Hart

quote: Tact is the art of making a point without making an enemy.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: There hasn't been any art yet. Art is just beginning.
author: Constantin Brancusi

quote: It's very important that we re-learn the art of resting and relaxing. Not only does it help prevent the onset of many illnesses that develop through chronic tension and worrying; it allows us to clear our minds, focus, and find creative solutions to problems.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: A fool's brain digests philosophy into folly, science into superstition, and art into pedantry. Hence University education.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Jazz music is America's past and its potential, summed up and sanctified and accessible to anybody who learns to listen to, feel, and understand it. The music can connect us to our earlier selves and to our better selves-to-come. It can remind us of where we fit on the time line of human achievement, an ultimate value of art.
author: Wynton Marsalis

quote: Life doesn't imitate art, it imitates bad television.
author: Woody Allen

quote: If you're not trying to be real, you don't have to get it right. That's art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Art is what you can get away with.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: No matter what is happening in life or in the world - war, natural disaster, poor health, pain, the death of loved ones - if existence is filled with art, music and literature, life will be fulfilling, a joy.
author: Karen DeCrow

quote: Pop Art looks out into the world. It doesn't look like a painting of something, it looks like the thing itself.
author: Roy Lichtenstein

quote: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: In mathematics the art of proposing a question must be held of higher value than solving it.
author: Georg Cantor

quote: Simplicity is the final achievement. After one has played a vast quantity of notes and more notes, it is simplicity that emerges as the crowning reward of art.
author: Frederic Chopin

quote: Diplomacy is the art of saying 'Nice doggie' until you can find a rock.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money they don't have for something they don't need.
author: Will Rogers

quote: A man paints with his brains and not with his hands.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Art has to move you and design does not, unless it's a good design for a bus.
author: David Hockney

quote: The artist who aims at perfection in everything achieves it in nothing.
author: Eugene Delacroix

quote: Art is the daughter of freedom.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Paint the essential character of things.
author: Camille Pissarro

quote: Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Sleeping is no mean art: for its sake one must stay awake all day.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Balance is key. Balance is a virtue. Balance is next to godliness, maybe. We should all aspire to better balance. Too much of what is said in this world is one-sided, and we need more balance - in our speech, in our music, in our art, in everything.
author: CeeLo Green

quote: The modern work of art, as I have said, is a symbol.
author: Herbert Read

quote: London, thou art the flower of cities all!
author: William Dunbar

quote: Our best teachers do more than impart facts and figures - they inspire and encourage students and instill a true desire to learn. That's a fine art in itself.
author: Sonny Perdue

quote: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: Life is a lot more interesting if you are interested in the people and the places around you. So, illuminate your little patch of ground, the people that you know, the things that you want to commemorate. Light them up with your art, with your music, with your writing, with whatever it is that you do.
author: Alan Moore

quote: The art of healing comes from nature, not from the physician. Therefore the physician must start from nature, with an open mind.
author: Paracelsus

quote: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy.
author: Will Durant

quote: A work of art is above all an adventure of the mind.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: I have no fear of making changes, destroying the image, etc., because the painting has a life of its own.
author: Jackson Pollock

quote: You can't do sketches enough. Sketch everything and keep your curiosity fresh.
author: John Singer Sargent

quote: Rationalism is the enemy of art, though necessary as a basis for architecture.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: All architecture is great architecture after sunset; perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Memory is a great artist. For every man and for every woman it makes the recollection of his or her life a work of art and an unfaithful record.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: All equestrians, if they last long enough, learn that riding in whatever form is a lifelong sport and art, an endeavor that is both familiar and new every time you take the horse out of his stall or pasture.
author: Jane Smiley

quote: Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Without innovation, it is a corpse.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Art consists of reshaping life, but it does not create life nor cause life.
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Art is, for me, the process of trying to wake up the soul. Because we live in an industrialized, fast-paced world that prefers that the soul remain asleep.
author: Bill Viola

quote: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: All great art is born of the metropolis.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: I'm for mechanical art. When I took up silk screening, it was to more fully exploit the preconceived image through the commercial techniques of multiple reproduction.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Art is always and everywhere the secret confession, and at the same time the immortal movement of its time.
author: Karl Marx

quote: I've always wanted to be an animator. That's an ultimate art form, right there.
author: Jason Marsden

quote: Art is basically made by dissatisfied people who are willing to find some means to relieve the dissatisfaction.
author: John Chamberlain

quote: Love-making is an art which must be studied.
author: Ivor Novello

quote: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
author: James Humes

quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
author: Victor Pinchuk

quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.
author: John Wooden

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
author: Bernie Siegel

quote: My trade and art is to live.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: This world is but a canvas to our imagination.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If we could but paint with the hand what we see with the eye.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The more horrifying this world becomes, the more art becomes abstract.
author: Ellen Key

quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Excellence is an art won by training and habituation. We do not act rightly because we have virtue or excellence, but we rather have those because we have acted rightly. We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Riding a race bike is an art - a thing that you do because you feel something inside.
author: Valentino Rossi

quote: Great art is an instant arrested in eternity.
author: James Huneker

quote: Art is either plagiarism or revolution.
author: Paul Gauguin

quote: I like to pretend that my art has nothing to do with me.
author: Roy Lichtenstein

quote: Next to the Word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating. It is either good or bad.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The art of war is simple enough. Find out where your enemy is. Get at him as soon as you can. Strike him as hard as you can, and keep moving on.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
author: Don Marquis

quote: The art and science of asking questions is the source of all knowledge.
author: Thomas Berger

quote: All art is but imitation of nature.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly and applying the wrong remedies.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
author: Julia Morgan

quote: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Every production of an artist should be the expression of an adventure of his soul.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: No great artist ever sees things as they really are. If he did, he would cease to be an artist.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The history of art is the history of revivals.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
author: Aristotle

quote: The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
author: Paul Hawken

quote: Life is like art. You have to work hard to keep it simple and still have meaning.
author: Charles de Lint

quote: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over.
author: Octavia Butler

quote: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
author: Voltaire

quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
author: Dorothea Lange

quote: I enjoy art, architecture, museums, churches and temples; anything that gives me insight into the history and soul of the place I'm in. I can also be a beach bum - I like to laze in the shade of a palm tree with a good book or float in a warm sea at sundown.
author: Cherie Lunghi

quote: Great art is never produced for its own sake. It is too difficult to be worth the effort.
author: Robert Quillen

quote: It is not up to me whether I win or lose. Ultimately, this might not be my day. And it is that philosophy towards sports, something that I really truly live by. I am emotional. I want to win. I am hungry. I am a competitor. I have that fire. But deep down, I truly enjoy the art of competing so much more than the result.

author: Michelangelo

author: Rainer Maria Rilke

author: Elizabeth Berkley

author: James Frey

author: Carrie Mae Weems

author: John Wesley Powell

quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Personality is everything in art and poetry.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: All art is at once surface and symbol. Those who go beneath the surface do so at their peril. Those who read the symbol do so at their peril. It is the spectator, and not life, that art really mirrors. Diversity of opinion about a work of art shows that the work is new, complex and vital.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: One eye sees, the other feels.
author: Paul Klee

quote: Only in art will the lion lie down with the lamb, and the rose grow without the thorn.
author: Martin Amis

quote: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Dance is the most fundamental of all art forms.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: When I think of art I think of beauty. Beauty is the mystery of life. It is not in the eye it is in the mind. In our minds there is awareness of perfection.
author: Agnes Martin

quote: Whenever we witness art in a building, we are aware of an energy contained by it.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: A beautiful lady is an accident of nature. A beautiful old lady is a work of art.
author: Louis Nizer

quote: A good mother remembers to serve fruit at breakfast, is always cheerful and never yells, manages not to project her own neuroses and inadequacies onto her children, is an active and beloved community volunteer. She remembers to make play dates, her children's clothes fit, she does art projects with them and enjoys all their games.
author: Ayelet Waldman

quote: The art of simplicity is a puzzle of complexity.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: Guided only by their feeling for symmetry, simplicity, and generality, and an indefinable sense of the fitness of things, creative mathematicians now, as in the past, are inspired by the art of mathematics rather than by any prospect of ultimate usefulness.
author: E. T. Bell

quote: It's not new that architecture can profoundly affect a place, sometimes transform it. Architecture and any art can transform a person, even save someone.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: My art is not limited to the songs I create but also to the reaction it creates. I like to sit back and look at the whole thing as if it's a tornado that I'm controlling. It's creating chaos. When you create chaos, ideas are turned upside down, and everybody looks at things in a different way.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: It is through art, and through art only, that we can realise our perfection.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The study of the art of motorcycle maintenance is really a miniature study of the art of rationality itself. Working on a motorcycle, working well, caring, is to become part of a process, to achieve an inner peace of mind. The motorcycle is primarily a mental phenomenon.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: I don't think there is too much art involved in what I do.
author: Giorgio Moroder

quote: I don't think art is propaganda; it should be something that liberates the soul, provokes the imagination and encourages people to go further. It celebrates humanity instead of manipulating it.
author: Keith Haring

quote: Errors are not in the art but in the artificers.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Art is the most intense mode of individualism that the world has known.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A picture is worth a thousand words.
author: Unknown

quote: It is the spectator, and not life, that art really mirrors.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: What the mass media offers is not popular art, but entertainment which is intended to be consumed like food, forgotten, and replaced by a new dish.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: For me, art is such a wide concept - anything can be art.
author: Sebastiao Salgado

quote: When art is defined by Damien Hirst and Jeff Koons, you've got a society that's impoverished.
author: Robert Adams

quote: Music is the biggest tool of revolution - the best way to reach out to the youth and involve them. If you can't contribute to the world with your art, I don't see the meaning of life.
author: Kailash Kher

quote: Just think for a moment if science really could move in the field of authenticity of works of art. There would be a cultural revolution to say the least, but also, I would say, a market revolution, let me add.
author: Maurizio Seracini

quote: It's been noted that writing about the production of art is a masquerade or metaphor for writing about writing. This may be true, there are similarities - both the verbal and the visual represent the thing or the concept.
author: Sarah Hall

quote: Speak the truth, do not yield to anger; give, if thou art asked for little; by these three steps thou wilt go near the gods.
author: Confucius

quote: The art of progress is to preserve order amid change and to preserve change amid order.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: There are no rules. That is how art is born, how breakthroughs happen. Go against the rules or ignore the rules. That is what invention is about.
author: Helen Frankenthaler

quote: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Graffiti's always been a temporary art form. You make your mark and then they scrub it off.
author: Banksy

quote: The show business has all phases and grades of dignity, from the exhibition of a monkey to the exposition of that highest art in music or the drama which secures for the gifted artists a world-wide fame princes well might envy.
author: P. T. Barnum

quote: And luckily, therefore the good old days return. The traditional art of driving counts again, and it is all about good tactics, skills and reflexes instead of simple power.
author: Jacky Ickx

quote: The enemy of art is the absence of limitations.
author: Orson Welles

quote: Art lies by its own artifice.
author: Ovid

quote: Gossip is the art of saying nothing in a way that leaves practically nothing unsaid.
author: Walter Winchell

quote: Thou art not for the earth, nor for the Heaven the world is for thee, thou art not for the world.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: When I view the world, I don't think of my own work. I think of my hope that, through art, people can get a sense of the type of invisible fabric that holds us all together, that holds the world together.
author: Jeff Koons

quote: I see no reason why the artistic world can't absolutely merge with Madison Avenue. Pop art is a move in that direction. Why can't we have advertisements with beautiful words and beautiful images?
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: To me, my brand is luxury, it's art, it's women, it's raw, it's urban.
author: Theophilus London

quote: I was always most interested in drawing - most of my childhood drawings are black-and-white line work. And when I kind of abandoned comics, through college and art school, I was doing a lot of painting. But once I started doing comics again, everything else just fell by the wayside.
author: Jeffrey Brown

quote: All art is propaganda, and ever must be, despite the wailing of the purists. I stand in utter shamelessness and say that whatever art I have for writing has been used always for propaganda for gaining the right of black folk to love and enjoy. I do not care a damn for any art that is not used for propaganda.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Every good painter paints what he is.
author: Jackson Pollock

quote: Every painting is a voyage into a sacred harbour.
author: Giotto di Bondone

quote: The art of leadership is saying no, not saying yes. It is very easy to say yes.
author: Tony Blair

quote: As a species, we are most animated when our days and nights on Earth are touched by the natural world. We can find immeasurable joy in the birth of a child, a great work of art, or falling in love.
author: Richard Louv

quote: The artist is a receptacle for emotions that come from all over the place: from the sky, from the earth, from a scrap of paper, from a passing shape, from a spider's web.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.
author: Willem de Kooning

quote: The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: No better way is there to learn to love Nature than to understand Art. It dignifies every flower of the field. And, the boy who sees the thing of beauty which a bird on the wing becomes when transferred to wood or canvas will probably not throw the customary stone.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not coming, but on our own readiness to receive him; not on the chance of his not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Summer is a great time to visit art museums, which offer the refreshing rinse of swimming pools - only instead of cool water, you immerse yourself in art.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
author: Henri Poincare

quote: Technology is a compulsive and addictive way to live. Verbal communication cannot be lost because of a lack of skill. The ability to listen and learn is key to mastering the art of communication. If you don't use your verbal skills and networking, it will disappear rapidly. Use technology wisely.
author: Rick Pitino

quote: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece. Help others. Drink deeply from good books. Make friendship a fine art. Build a shelter against a rainy day.
author: John Wooden

quote: The art of art, the glory of expression and the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Once an object has been incorporated in a picture it accepts a new destiny.
author: Georges Braque

quote: Art is like a border of flowers along the course of civilization.
author: Lincoln Steffens

quote: To me, photography is an art of observation. It's about finding something interesting in an ordinary place... I've found it has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.
author: Elliott Erwitt

quote: If a work of art is rich and vital and complete, those who have artistic instincts will see its beauty, and those to whom ethics appeal more strongly than aesthetics will see its moral lesson. It will fill the cowardly with terror, and the unclean will see in it their own shame.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Find a beautiful piece of art. If you fall in love with Van Gogh or Matisse or John Oliver Killens, or if you fall love with the music of Coltrane, the music of Aretha Franklin, or the music of Chopin - find some beautiful art and admire it, and realize that that was created by human beings just like you, no more human, no less.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The art of effective listening is essential to clear communication, and clear communication is necessary to management success.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
author: Julia Child

quote: There will be very few occasions when you are absolutely certain about anything. You will consistently be called upon to make decisions with limited information. That being the case, your goal should not be to eliminate uncertainty. Instead, you must develop the art of being clear in the face of uncertainty.
author: Andy Stanley

quote: Sometimes, being different feels a lot like being alone. But with that being said, being true to that and being true to my standards and my way of doing things in my art and my music, everything that has made me feel very different... in the end, it has made me the happiest.
author: Lindsey Stirling

quote: Some painters transform the sun into a yellow spot, others transform a yellow spot into the sun.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Art is anything you can get away with.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
author: Mark Van Doren

quote: The marble not yet carved can hold the form of every thought the greatest artist has.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Music is the art of the prophets and the gift of God.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I consider skateboarding an art form, a lifestyle and a sport. 'Action sport' would be the least offensive categorization.
author: Tony Hawk

quote: Art in the classroom not only spurs creativity, it also inspires learning.
author: Mickey Hart

quote: Tact is the art of making a point without making an enemy.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: There hasn't been any art yet. Art is just beginning.
author: Constantin Brancusi

quote: It's very important that we re-learn the art of resting and relaxing. Not only does it help prevent the onset of many illnesses that develop through chronic tension and worrying; it allows us to clear our minds, focus, and find creative solutions to problems.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: A fool's brain digests philosophy into folly, science into superstition, and art into pedantry. Hence University education.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Jazz music is America's past and its potential, summed up and sanctified and accessible to anybody who learns to listen to, feel, and understand it. The music can connect us to our earlier selves and to our better selves-to-come. It can remind us of where we fit on the time line of human achievement, an ultimate value of art.
author: Wynton Marsalis

quote: Life doesn't imitate art, it imitates bad television.
author: Woody Allen

quote: If you're not trying to be real, you don't have to get it right. That's art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Art is what you can get away with.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: No matter what is happening in life or in the world - war, natural disaster, poor health, pain, the death of loved ones - if existence is filled with art, music and literature, life will be fulfilling, a joy.
author: Karen DeCrow

quote: Pop Art looks out into the world. It doesn't look like a painting of something, it looks like the thing itself.
author: Roy Lichtenstein

quote: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: In mathematics the art of proposing a question must be held of higher value than solving it.
author: Georg Cantor

quote: Simplicity is the final achievement. After one has played a vast quantity of notes and more notes, it is simplicity that emerges as the crowning reward of art.
author: Frederic Chopin

quote: Diplomacy is the art of saying 'Nice doggie' until you can find a rock.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money they don't have for something they don't need.
author: Will Rogers

quote: A man paints with his brains and not with his hands.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Art has to move you and design does not, unless it's a good design for a bus.
author: David Hockney

quote: The artist who aims at perfection in everything achieves it in nothing.
author: Eugene Delacroix

quote: Art is the daughter of freedom.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Paint the essential character of things.
author: Camille Pissarro

quote: Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Sleeping is no mean art: for its sake one must stay awake all day.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Balance is key. Balance is a virtue. Balance is next to godliness, maybe. We should all aspire to better balance. Too much of what is said in this world is one-sided, and we need more balance - in our speech, in our music, in our art, in everything.
author: CeeLo Green

quote: The modern work of art, as I have said, is a symbol.
author: Herbert Read

quote: London, thou art the flower of cities all!
author: William Dunbar

quote: Our best teachers do more than impart facts and figures - they inspire and encourage students and instill a true desire to learn. That's a fine art in itself.
author: Sonny Perdue

quote: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: Life is a lot more interesting if you are interested in the people and the places around you. So, illuminate your little patch of ground, the people that you know, the things that you want to commemorate. Light them up with your art, with your music, with your writing, with whatever it is that you do.
author: Alan Moore

quote: The art of healing comes from nature, not from the physician. Therefore the physician must start from nature, with an open mind.
author: Paracelsus

quote: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy.
author: Will Durant

quote: A work of art is above all an adventure of the mind.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: I have no fear of making changes, destroying the image, etc., because the painting has a life of its own.
author: Jackson Pollock

quote: You can't do sketches enough. Sketch everything and keep your curiosity fresh.
author: John Singer Sargent

quote: Rationalism is the enemy of art, though necessary as a basis for architecture.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: All architecture is great architecture after sunset; perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Memory is a great artist. For every man and for every woman it makes the recollection of his or her life a work of art and an unfaithful record.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: All equestrians, if they last long enough, learn that riding in whatever form is a lifelong sport and art, an endeavor that is both familiar and new every time you take the horse out of his stall or pasture.
author: Jane Smiley

quote: Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Without innovation, it is a corpse.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Art consists of reshaping life, but it does not create life nor cause life.
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Art is, for me, the process of trying to wake up the soul. Because we live in an industrialized, fast-paced world that prefers that the soul remain asleep.
author: Bill Viola

quote: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: All great art is born of the metropolis.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: I'm for mechanical art. When I took up silk screening, it was to more fully exploit the preconceived image through the commercial techniques of multiple reproduction.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Art is always and everywhere the secret confession, and at the same time the immortal movement of its time.
author: Karl Marx

quote: I've always wanted to be an animator. That's an ultimate art form, right there.
author: Jason Marsden

quote: Art is basically made by dissatisfied people who are willing to find some means to relieve the dissatisfaction.
author: John Chamberlain

quote: Love-making is an art which must be studied.
author: Ivor Novello

quote: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
author: James Humes

quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
author: Victor Pinchuk

quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.
author: John Wooden

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
author: Bernie Siegel

quote: My trade and art is to live.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: This world is but a canvas to our imagination.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If we could but paint with the hand what we see with the eye.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The more horrifying this world becomes, the more art becomes abstract.
author: Ellen Key

quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Excellence is an art won by training and habituation. We do not act rightly because we have virtue or excellence, but we rather have those because we have acted rightly. We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Riding a race bike is an art - a thing that you do because you feel something inside.
author: Valentino Rossi

quote: Great art is an instant arrested in eternity.
author: James Huneker

quote: Art is either plagiarism or revolution.
author: Paul Gauguin

quote: I like to pretend that my art has nothing to do with me.
author: Roy Lichtenstein

quote: Next to the Word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating. It is either good or bad.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The art of war is simple enough. Find out where your enemy is. Get at him as soon as you can. Strike him as hard as you can, and keep moving on.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
author: Don Marquis

quote: The art and science of asking questions is the source of all knowledge.
author: Thomas Berger

quote: All art is but imitation of nature.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly and applying the wrong remedies.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
author: Julia Morgan

quote: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Every production of an artist should be the expression of an adventure of his soul.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: No great artist ever sees things as they really are. If he did, he would cease to be an artist.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The history of art is the history of revivals.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
author: Aristotle

quote: The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
author: Paul Hawken

quote: Life is like art. You have to work hard to keep it simple and still have meaning.
author: Charles de Lint

quote: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
author: Pablo Picasso
